isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - SKIRT PANELS, AERO SIDE SKIRT PANELS, BODY AIR DEFLECTORS, BUMPERS AND ROOFS - 0. AERODYNAMIC BUMPERS - 9400i Model Series

svcsubproc.title: Remove (As Sub-Assemblies)

note.para: An assistant is required during removal procedures of aerodynamic bumpers

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 40 for the following Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Beginning at front bumper end assembly (left or right) (Item 7 and/or Item 17), loosen and remove 5/15"-18 UNC x 1-1/4" SST hex hd bolt, 5/16" SST flat washer, and 5/16"-18 UNC x 1-1/4" hex lock nut (Item 15).

note.para: An assistant is required in removal of front bumper cover.

step1.para: Loosen and remove lower 5/16"-18 UNC x 1-1/4" SST hex hd bolts, 5/16" SST flat washers, 5/16" plain washers and 5/16"-18 UNC hex lock nuts (Item 14).

Loosen and remove upper 5/16"-18 UNC x 2" SST hex hd bolt, 5/16" SST flat washer, spacer (Item 9), 5/16" plain washer and 5/16"-18 UNC hex lock nut. An assistant is needed to support end of center bumper cover during removal of opposite end fasteners. Follow same procedure (Step 3) to remove fasteners on opposite end of cover. Remove center bumper cover.
Replace 5/16"-18 UNC x 1-1/4" SST hex hd bolts, 5/16" SST flat washers and 5/16"-18 UNC hex lock nuts removed in Step 1. Finger tighten.

Beginning at the outside ends of center bumper reinforcement channel (Item 10), loosen and remove (2) 3/8"-16 UNC x 1-1/4" hex hd bolts, 3/8" flat washers and 3/8"-16 UNC hex lock nuts (Item 16). Remove center bumper reinforcement end plates (Item 5), one each side.
Loosen and remove (8) 1/2"-20 UNC x 1-1/4" hex hd bolts, 1/2"-20 UNC flanged hex nuts (Item 8). With an assistant, remove the center bumper reinforcement channel.

Bumper end section removal left side. Loosen and remove 5/16"-18 UNC x 1-1/4" (Item 6) SST hex hd bolt, special SST flat washer and 5/16"-18 UNC hex lock nut, from bumper outer support brace ( Item 3). With the assistant supporting end of loosened assembly, remove the 5/16"-18 UNC x 1-1/4" (Item 15), SST hex hd bolt, 5/16" SST flat hd washer and 5/16"-18 UNC hex lock nut, previously replaced in Step 4. Remove bumper (Item 7) extension assembly.

Bumper end section removal right side. Loosen and remove 5/16"-18 UNC x 1-1/4" (Item 6) SST hex hd bolt, special SST flat washer and 5/16"-18 UNC hex lock nut, from bumper outer support brace (Item 21). With the assistant supporting end of loosened assembly, remove the 5/16"-18 UNC x 1-1/4" (Item 15), SST hex hd bolt, 5/16" SST flat hd washer and 5/16"-18 UNC hex lock nut, previously replaced in Step 4. Remove bumper (Item 17) extension assembly.

Removal of inner and outer bumper support braces (Item 3 and 4 - left side, and 20 and 21 - right side). Loosen and remove 3/8"-16 UNC x 1-1/2" hex hd bolt (Item 2). Remove inner bumper support bracket. Loosen and remove 3/8"-16 UNC x 1-1/4" hex hd bolt (Item 3). Remove outer bumper support bracket. Follow procedure in Step 9 to remove Items 20 and 21 (right hand side).

svcsubproc.title: Install (As Sub-Assemblies)

note.para: An assistant is required in the installation procedure.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 40 for the following Items in parentheses.

step1.para:
Installation of inner and outer bumper support brackets (Items 20 and 21 - Right side, and Items 3 and 4 - Left side). Place outer bumper support bracket against frame member and align with holes . Insert 3/8"-16 UNC x 1-1/2" hex hd bolt (Item 1) through bracket assembly and finger tighten. Place inner bumper support bracket against the outer bumper support bracket and align with hole. Insert 3/8"-16 UNC x 1-1/2" hex hd bolt (Item 1) through bracket assembly and finger tighten (reference Item 23). With both brackets in place, tighten. Refer to the TORQUE CHART
.

Place bumper end extension assembly on outer bumper support bracket and align and insert 5/16"-18 UNC x 1-1/4" SST hex hd bolt, and special SST flat washer through bumper end extension (Item 7, Left side) and outer bumper support bracket (Item 6), 5/16" plain washer and 5/16"-18 UNC hex lock nut. Refer to the TORQUE CHART
.
Follow procedures in Steps 1 and 2 to install opposite bumper end extension.

With an assistant, place and align center bumper reinforcement channel with bumper mounting brackets (Item 22). Insert (8) 1/2"-20 UNC x 1-3/4" flanged hex hd bolts, (4) each side, install 1/2"-20 UNC flanged hex lock nuts, and tighten. Refer to the TORQUE CHART
.

Install 3/8"-16 UNC x 1-1/4" hex hd bolts, 3/8" flat washers (Item 8), (2) each side at ends of center bumper reinforcement channel (Item 10). Align with bumper end extension (Item 7) and bumper reinforcement plates (Item 5). Install 3/8" flat washer and 3/8" -16 UNC hex lock nut and tighten. Refer to the TORQUE CHART
.

Prior to installation of bumper center cover, insert the upper 5/16"-18 UNC x 2" SST bolt and 5/16" SST flat washer through bumper cover. Place bumper spacer (Item 9) on 5/16" bolt and tape in place. Align bumper cover (Item 13) with center bumper reinforcement channel. Install the 5/16" plain washers and 5/16"-18 UNC hex lock nuts (each side) and tighten. Refer to the TORQUE CHART
.

Align and insert lower 5/16"-18 UNC x 1-1/4" SST hex hd bolts (Item 4), 5/16" SST flat washers, 5/16" plain washers and 5/16-18 UNC hex lock nut, (1) each side, and tighten. Refer to the TORQUE CHART
.

Align inner bumper support bracket (Item 4) with bumper extension end (Item 7) and front bumper center cover (Item 13). Insert 5/16"-18 UNC x 1-1/4" SST hex hd bolt (Item 14) 5/16" SST flat washer, 5/16" plain washer and 5/16"-18 UNC hex lock nut, (1) each side, and tighten. Refer to the TORQUE CHART
.
Follow procedures for alignment of Items 13, 17, and 21 as described in Step 8.
Inspect all fasteners and alignment for secure fit.

svcsubproc.title: Aerodynamic Bumper Assembly Removal (One Piece)

note.para: In the removal procedure, suitable stands or wood blocks are recommended to support the assembly. An assistant may be required to help support and remove the aerodynamic bumper one piece assembly.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 40 for the following Items in parentheses.

step1.para:
Beginning on the driver side of the chassis, place a suitable stand or block under the bumper assembly at a point that will sustain the weight of the side assembly being removed.
Loosen and remove (Items 1 and 2) 3/8"-16 UNC x 1-1/2" hex hd bolts, and 3/8" flat washers. This will release the inner and outer bumper support brackets (Item 3 and 4) from the side member (Item 24).
Follow the same procedure as described in Step 1 to disconnect the right side inner and outer bumper support brackets (Items 8 and 9), from the side member (Item 24).

para.emph: NOTE - Before further parts removal, check to insure the stand or blocks supporting the bumper assembly are in a stable position.

step1.para: Loosen and remove the 1/2"-20 UNC flanged hex nuts (4) per side from behind the bumper mounting brackets (Item 22). With an assistant, remove the entire aerodynamic bumper assembly from the bumper mounting brackets.

svcsubproc.title: Aerodynamic Bumper Assembly Installation (One Piece)

note.para: In the Install procedure, suitable stands or wood blocks are recommended to support the assembly. An assistant may be required to help support and remove the aerodynamic bumper one piece assembly.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 40 for the following Items in parentheses.

step1.para:
Place the bumper assembly on stand or supports, and with an assistant, align the bolts (Item 8) on the rear side of the center bumper reinforcement channel with the bumper mounting brackets (Item 22). Install the (8) 1/2"-20 UNC flanged hex nuts, (4) each side. Tighten flanged nuts. Refer to the TORQUE CHART
.

Beginning on the curb side of the chassis, place the inner and outer (Items 8 and 9) bumper support brackets with holes "B" and "C" in the (Item 24) side member. Insert the 3/8"-16 UNC X 1-1/2 hex hd bolts and 3/8" flat washers (Items 1 and 2) and tighten. Refer to the TORQUE CHART
.

Follow the same procedure as described in Step, 1 to install the left side inner and outer bumper support brackets (Items 3 and 4), to the side member (Item 24) and tighten. Refer to the TORQUE CHART
.
